sulu_page.title: Title
sulu_page.resource_locator_assigned_to_o: The URL "{resourceLocator}" is already assigned to another page.
sulu_page.resource_locator_was_moved: The URL you are trying to use was moved to "{newResourceLocator}". Please check the URL history of that page to remove the redirect.
sulu_page.enable_shadow_page_info_text: This function is disabled if the current locale is already used as shadow locale.
sulu_page.author: Author
sulu_page.meta_title_info_text: SEO guidelines recommend to use a meta title that is no longer than 55 characters.
sulu_page.meta_description_info_text: SEO guidelines recommend to use a meta description that is no longer than 160 characters.
sulu_page.meta_keywords_info_text: Keywords are sperated by commas and should match the content of the page. SEO guidelines recommend to use no more than 5 keywords per page.
sulu_page.no_index: no-index (page will not be indexed by search engines)
sulu_page.no_follow: no-follow (links on this page will not be followed by the search engine)
sulu_page.delete_draft_warning_text: Do you really want to delete the draft? All data will be lost. The published page will not be changed.
sulu_page.unpublish_warning_text: Do you really want to unpublish the page? All website links will be lost. This setting can be changed at any time without data loss.
sulu_page.restore_version_text: A new draft will be created. An existing draft version will be overwritten
sulu_page.hide_block_description: This block will not be published, but remains editable in the admin.
sulu_page.segment_description: The block will be automatically filtered on the website by the chosen segment.
sulu_page.target_groups_description: The block will only be visible for the selected target groups.
sulu_page.schedules_description: The block will only be visible if at least one condition is valid.
sulu_page.delete_page_dependant_warning_: {1}Are you sure that you also want to delete one subpage?|]1,Inf[Are you sure that you also want to delete %count% subpages?
sulu_activity.description.pages.route_re: {userFullName} has removed a route from the page "{resourceTitle}"
sulu_activity.description.pages.draft_re: {userFullName} has discarded the draft of the page "{resourceTitle}"
sulu_activity.description.pages.moved: {userFullName} has moved the page "{resourceTitle}" from "{context_previousParentTitle}" to "{context_newParentTitle}"
sulu_activity.description.pages.children: {userFullName} has reordered the children of the page "{resourceTitle}"
sulu_activity.description.pages.translat: {userFullName} has added a new translation "{resourceLocale}" to the page "{resourceTitle}"
{userFullName} has copied the "{context_sourceLocale}" translation of the page "{resourceTitle}" into "{resourceLocale}"
{userFullName} has removed the "{resourceLocale}" translation of the page "{resourceTitle}"
{userFullName} has restored the "{resourceLocale}" translation of the page "{resourceTitle}"
sulu_activity.description.pages.version_: {userFullName} has restored the version "{context_version}" of the page "{resourceTitle}"
sulu_activity.description.pages.preview_: {userFullName} has generated a public preview link "{resourceTitle}"
{userFullName} has revoked the public preview link "{resourceTitle}"
